attributes.action: award the actor Johnny Depp and honourary knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe his contribution to the British film industry deserves a knighthood.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
